alert.message: 磁盘空间不足,请及时扩容
alert.name: GN_sdkdb1_Master1 Mountpoint Usage alert

alert.message: 磁盘空间不足,请及时扩容
alert.name: GN_sdkdb2_Master2 Mountpoint Usage alert

alert.message: 磁盘空间不足,请及时扩容
alert.name: GN_sdkdb_Slave1 Mountpoint Usage alert

targets.expr: sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="GN_sdkdb1_Master1", mode!="idle",mode!="iowait"}[10s])) by (mode)* 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_sdkdb1_Master1"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="GN_sdkdb1_Master1", mode!="idle",mode!="iowait"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_sdkdb1_Master1"})

sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="GN_sdkdb2_Master2", mode!="idle",mode!="iowait"}[10s])) by (mode)* 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_sdkdb2_Master2"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="GN_sdkdb2_Master2", mode!="idle",mode!="iowait"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_sdkdb2_Master2"})

sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="GN_sdkdb_Slave1", mode!="idle",mode!="iowait"}[10s])) by (mode)* 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_sdkdb_Slave1"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="GN_sdkdb_Slave1", mode!="idle",mode!="iowait"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="GN_sdkdb_Slave1"})

alert.name: GN_sdkdb1_Master1 MySQL Client Thread Activity alert

panels.description:
**Peak Threads Connected**  is number of peak number of connections MySQL had in the period of time

**Peak Threads Running** is the peak number of threads considered "Running" by MySQL, not Sleeping or Waiting on Table level locks which can be indicative for workload spikes

**Avg Threads Running** is the average number of Threads running over interval which can be indicative of sustained load
panels.title: GN_sdkdb1_Master1 MySQL Client Thread Activity
